text: The 18th District of the Iowa Senate is located in southern Iowa, and is currently composed of Polk County. ==Current elected officials== Janet Petersen is the senator currently representing the 18th District. The area of the 18th District contains two Iowa House of Representatives districts: *The 35th District (represented by Ako Abdul-Samad) *The 36th District (represented by Marti Anderson) The district is also located in Iowa's 3rd congressional district, which is represented by Cindy Axne. ==Past senators== The district has previously been represented by: *Robert Carr, 1983-1989 *Mike Connolly, 1990-2002 *Mary Lundby, 2003-2008 *Swati Dandekar, 2009-2011 *Liz Mathis, 2012 *Janet Petersen, 2013-present ==See also== *Iowa General Assembly *Iowa Senate ==References== 18
title: Iowa Senate, District 18
